[\[1b.1\]{D1874}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza sA d+ha naM sid+d+hi saM b+ha ba ni d+hi nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/_
[\[1b.2\]]dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zab gsal gnyis med dag pa'i bdag nyid kyis/_/bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i sku/_/dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
[\[1b.3\]]la/_/rgyal sras rgyu dang bcas pa rab 'byung zhing /_/rtag sogs rgyu 'dras khams kun rab bkang nas/_/ji srid bar du don mdzad rgyun mi 'chad/_/khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' de dang ni/_/de yi
[\[1b.4\]]sras rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab pa/_/snying ga'i dbus bsam de la brtan sogs skye/_/chos bdag khros pas kyang ni mi gnon pa/_/mi shigs thig le
[\[1b.5\]]gang yin rtogs par mos/_/blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis pad+ma kha 'byed pa/_/rmongs pa sreg byed snying gi mun pa sel mdzad pa/_/yon tan dag pa'i mkha' la rgyu zhing 'jigs bral mdzad/_/bla
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal snga rgyal gyur cig_/dpal ldan gsang 'dus mtsho chen las/_/bla ma'i brgyud rim gru gzings kyis/_/yid bzhin nor bu rnam pa gsum/_/sman pa'i zhabs kyis rnyed pa'o/_/
[\[2a.2\]]de rnyed dpe mkhyud spangs byas te/_/'di ni thun mong cig shos kyi/_/dngos grub 'byung phyir gter 'dra ba/_/phan phyir bdag gis brtsam par bya/_/gzhung gzhan spangs te bla ma'i brgyud rim gyis/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i
[\[2a.3\]]mnyam 'dus sgrub pa'i thabs/_/dam pas gsol ba btab phyir rab brod cing /_/dad pas ci nus bdag gis bshad par bya/_/de la kha cig ni yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams ni dam pa ma yin par mkhas
[\[2a.4\]]par grags pa rnams la bla ma nyid du khas blangs nas de'i lam la zhugs te/_dka' thub dang smyung ba dang /_brtul zhugs la sogs pas don dam pa gcig po la dpyod cing /_'di snyam du bdag gi rgyu'i 'khrul 'khor
[\[2a.5\]]la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu skyes kyang /_de rnams kyis stong pa'i dngos po ni yod de/_de tsam zhig brtags pas mngon du byed kyang /_dngos po la don dam par zhen pas stong pa nyid mi shes te grol ba dang rgyang ring du
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/ji skad du/_stong pa nyid ni ma shes pas/_/kun la 'das pa des mi shes/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam 'jigs pas/_/stong pa nyid ni shes par bya/_/zhes 'byung bas so/_/yang kha cig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad zin kyang /_dam pa ma yin pas de'i lam
[\[2b.2\]]la zhugs te/_bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phung po dang skye mched dang /_khams rnams mi rtag pa la sogs par 'jig cing /_sdom pa'i snod la brten te/_zhugs pa la sogs pa'i lam gyi phung po la sogs pa la grol nas lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /_lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan
[\[2b.3\]]las 'das pa mngon du byed do/_/'di yang ma rig pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'bras bu phyir ldog pa can zhes bya ste/_de yang ji skad du/_rtsa ba'i rnam shes log gyur nas/_/lhag bcas lhag ma med gyur pa'i/_/rnam grol 'bras bu thob 'gyur yang /_/mngon du rgyu ba med pa yi/_/ma rig
[\[2b.4\]]bag chags dang 'brel phyir/_/rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtshos/_/de la thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir/_/dpal ldan go cha'i 'od zer dang /_/phyag gis dbu la reg mdzad nas/_/de yi ro myong zlog mdzad de/_/yang dag lam la 'dzud par mdzad/_/ces gsang ba'i rim pa phye
[\[2b.5\]]ba las gsungs so/_/yang kha cig ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa dang phrad du zin kyang /_de rnams kyis brgyud rim mkhyud pas/_sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bskal ba mi nyung bar bsags nas/_sa'i de bzhin nyid du mngon du byed cing rim gyis sa bcu mngon du mthar thug
[\[2b.6\]]par byed do/_/de'i sprul pa'i sbyor bas dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid du skye ba len pa dang /_gling la sogs pa la gzigs par mdzad nas yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang /_lhums nas bltam pa dang /_gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa dang /_khab bzhes pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung
[\[2b.7\]]ba dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyad pa ston pa dang /_de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i man ngag rang rig chos kyi sku mngon du byed pa bstan pa'i phyir/_til gyi gong bu bzhin du ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bstan te/_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ye shes kyi phyag rgya gnang nas/_snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho gas rtsa ba'i ye shes dmigs pa dang bral ba/_sbyor ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid sngon dang phyis kyi sbyor ba mngon du byas te/_bdud btul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa mdzad do/_/don
[\[3a.2\]]de lta bu'i snod dkon par gzigs nas/_sba bar mdzad de sangs rgyas pa'i tshul so sor mthong bar mdzad do/_/bla ma chen po'i zhal nas ji skad du/_ci'i phyir shAkya thub pa yis/_/grangs med par du tshogs bsags kyang /_/'di don ma rtogs nai rany+dzar/_/ci yang ma yin
[\[3a.3\]]ting 'dzin gnas/_/de tshe bde gshegs kun gyis kyang /_/thal byung blo chags de bzlog ste/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rnam dag pa'i/_/zab gsal gnyis med rab bstan te/_/nam phyed dus su rgyal ba ltar/_/de nyid bsgoms pas tho rangs su/_/skad cig gis ni yang
[\[3a.4\]]dag rtogs/_/byang chub snying por zhugs byas nas/_/dpung chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste/_/sems can gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/_/de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di/_/skal ba ldan pa 'ga' zhig la/_/zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan/_/
[\[3a.5\]]brgyud de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i tshul 'dis shes par bya'o/_/gal te lam gzhan gyis sangs rgyas pa srid na ni/_de'i bla ma dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na 'bras bu sku gsum ni gcig kho na ste
[\[3a.6\]]de'i lam ni sngags kyi spyod pa 'di'o/_/ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad byang chub pa'i rgyud las/_sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni/_/rdo rje sngags kyi don sgom yin/_/zhes 'byung bas so/_/sngags kyi spyod pa
[\[3a.7\]]la mos pa de dag kyang bzhir shes par bya'o/_/kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa dang /_bdag gi de kho na nyid la sogs pas lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong bar byas nas/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/_/yang kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa spangs nas/_mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/_tshogs gnyis bsags
[\[3b.2\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/_/yang kha cig ni gtsang sbra la sogs pa smad cing nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig sems dpa' dang /_phyi rol gyi ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rang gi lha mnyes par byas pas
[\[3b.3\]]mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/_/de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu la mos pa'i gdul bya gzung ba'i phyir thabs gsungs pa ste/_phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa
[\[3b.4\]]yin par shes par bya'o/_/phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_gang dag sems ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'i thabs la/_brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas skad cig re re la yang snod dang bcud dang lam dang 'bras
[\[3b.5\]]bur bcas pa sbyong bar byed cing /_rnal 'byor dang phyag rgya la brten nas tshe 'di nyid las rab dang rab kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ba la som nyi med pas bla na med pa'o/_/de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni dpal ldan 'dus pa ste/_ji lta bu zhe na/_chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dag_/'dus phyir
[\[3b.6\]]snod yang dam pa'o/_/rmongs pa'i mun nag [(]sal [,]sel [)]bas na/_/sgron ma'i mchog ni 'di yin no/_/rta rgod lta bu'i sems 'dul bas/_/'thad pa'i srab skyogs 'di yin no/_/rnam shes glang chen yan lta bu/_/'gugs phyir lcags kyu dam pa'o/_/rnal 'byor mchog tu nges
[\[3b.7\]]pa yi/_/dam sdom can gyi tshong 'dus so/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/_/sgrol byed gru ni chen po'o/_/mngon mtho nges legs khang bzang gi_/steng du phyin byed them skas so/_/rnam rtog las byung nyon mongs kyi/_/grong khyer 'joms shing grol ba yi/_/'khor lo
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]skyong phyir rgyal po'o/_/bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos/_/nye bar bstan pa'i mdo sde dang /_/de 'dra'i tshul len rgyud 'di ni/_/kun gyi phyi ma gsungs pa ni/_/don rnams de ru gtan la phab/_/'di don sgom byed rnal 'byor pa/_/ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang
[\[4a.2\]]ba bas/_/dga' dang rtsod pa med pa dang /_/srung ba dang ni dran pa dang /_/bag yod pa yis brtson bya'o/_/de lta bu'i gzhung de la rtog pa mngon du gtong ba'i nyan pa po rnams khas len pa'i yan lag dang /_gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par bshad pas/_gang zag
[\[4a.3\]]gzhan yid brtan du rung bar bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad pas der zhes bya'o/_/ye shes las sprul pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bstan pa yang der shes par bya ste/_de'i phyis 'byung ba'i don rje btsun rnams kyis snod du rung bar
[\[4a.4\]]byas pa'i gang zag la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bsdus te bstan pa de sgrub thabs kyi rim pa 'dir rgyas par bshad par bya'o/_/de la dang po snying rje'i stobs las skyes/_/byang chub sems ldan sbyin pa la sogs brgyan/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor lor cho ga bzhin/_/dbang
[\[4a.5\]]bskur gnang ba thob pas rim 'di bya/_/gang zhig dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs/_/gang rung gnas su stegs bu grub bzhi pa/_/tsan+dan mchog sogs byugs nas bde ba'i stan/_/rdo rje skyi la mo krung 'dug bsam gtan bya/_/dang por tho rangs nyi dbus su/_/steng
[\[4a.6\]]sogs kyis dag mthing ga'i hUM/_/'od zer gyis mthong yul dmigs te/_/snying rje la sogs bsgom par bya/_/'od zer gyis gsal sangs rgyas dang /_/bla ma la sogs mdun du dmigs/_/gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa yi/_/mchod pa'i sprin spro phyag kyang 'tshal/_/gang
[\[4a.7\]]zhig thogs med dus nas srid pa'i chu rgyun la/_/rtog pas rnam par bsgos pa'i sdig pa ma lus rnams/_/thugs rje cher ldan khyod kyi mdun du yang /_/gsam du dmigs pa gsal te bshags par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/'phags pa gzhan
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]rnams kyi yang dge ba gang /_/ma lus bdag gis de dag yi rangs nas/_/bla med yang dag byang chub phyir bsngo'o/_/spros med thugs ni zla ba lta bu ste/_/mtha' yas don du thabs kyi sku chen po/_/rtag tu bdag gi yid dang dbyer med pa/_/bde bar gshegs pa rtag tu skyabs
[\[4b.2\]]su mchi/_/rtog pa kun las nges par grol ba yi/_/dam pa ma lus kun gyi phun tshogs rten/_/dngos po kun gyi ngo bo gcig pa po/_/chos la bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/_/bcings pa ma lus rnam par spangs pa yi/_/dpal ldan snying rje mchog gis rab drangs
[\[4b.3\]]pa/_/rab tu dga' la sogs pa rab gnas pa'i/_/'dul ba'i dbang po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam pa dag pas rnam smin dag pa yis/_/sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus kun bcom ste/_/mi 'phrog pa yis brgyan pa'i
[\[4b.4\]]sems kyis kyang /_/byang chub tu ni sems ni bskyed par bgyi/_/sras dang ldan pa'i bde bar gshegs pa yi/_/thun mong lam ste pha rol phyin pa bcu/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yid kyis ni/_/da ltar 'dir ni bdag gis bstan par bya/_/sdug bsngal
[\[4b.5\]]la gnas sems can rnams/_/snying rjes yang ni dmigs byas te/_/byang chub sems ni dpag med pa/_/rin chen bdag gis bsam par bya/_/rang bzhin med phyir stong pa nyid/_/rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med/_/rjes su dpag pa dang bral bas/_/smon med nyid du nges
[\[4b.6\]]pa'o/_/oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_sngags des bdag gzhan dngos po kun/_/gcig byas de nyid gsum mtshan ma/_/dgyes mdzad yas mar sbrengs pa yi/_/mdun gyi mkha' la bsam par bya/_/stong las nyi dkyil hUM nag las/_/rdo rje zer 'phros phyi
[\[4b.7\]]rol bcad/_/'og dang phyogs mtshams steng spros pas/_/sa gzhi ra ba bla rer bskyed/_/b+hU~M 'khor rtsibs bcu 'od zer drag_/pad nyir khro bo 'khor lor bsgom/_/de dbus hUM mdzad rtag pa sogs/_/gnas 'gyur de las chos 'byung bskyed/_/gru gsum dkar po
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]gyen la gnas/_/sna tshogs 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro/_/nam mkha'i dkyil du pad+ma dang /_/sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya/_/de dbus zla steng b+h+rUM las skyes/_/'khor lo b+h+rUM mtshan las byung ba/_/rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad las/_/gyur
[\[5a.2\]]pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa bsgom/_/gru bzhi la sogs yon tan ldan/_/sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu'i steng /_/nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun dag dang /_/zla ba'i gdan ni bcu gnyis bskyed/_/de nyid gsum gnas sems pa pas pas/_/bde gshegs rnams kyis de la
[\[5a.3\]]gzigs/_/rang gi khams su shes rab thabs/_/dbyangs yig bde ba'i yi ger 'gyur/_/dbu rtse las byon ye shes sems/_/'dres gyur rten babs zla gnyis gyur/_/'du zhing 'phro ba'i sbyor ba las/_/gcig tu gyur pa bsam pa'o/_/de las hUM dkar
[\[5a.4\]]las byung ba/_/rdo rje rtse lnga me shel gzugs/_/phyogs kun 'od zer 'phro bsams nas/_/hUM bcas ldan pas nga rgyal bya/_/oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_de las 'phros pa bde gshegs kyis/_/'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid du byas/_/slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/
[\[5a.5\]]btsud nas bdag la nga rgyal bya/_/oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/_sa bon gsang gsum rdo rjer gyur/_/gcig gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog_/'gro kun ro mnyam gcig pa po/_/kun du bzang po bsgom par bya/_/sku dang dbus zhal zla nor 'dra/_/g.yas gnag
[\[5a.6\]]g.yon ni dmar po la/_/rin chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa'i/_/phyag gnyis rang snang shes rab 'khyud/_/g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri ste/_/g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/_/mtshon byed mtshan ma dbu rgyan la/_/mi bskyod pa yis brgyan par bsgom/_/de nas 'dod
[\[5a.7\]]chags chen po yis/_/'dus pa'i 'jig rten gzigs gyur nas/_/sbyor ba'i sgra yis rang lus la/_/rnam snang la sogs gzhug par bya/_/de ni spyan ma la sogs dang /_/gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi bdag_/rnam pa dgu ni spro byas nas/_/rang gi shes rab
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]nyid la thim/_/shes rab de yi pad dkyil du/_/bde las sprul pa'i 'khor lo bskyed/_/gzigs gyur 'gro ba ma lus pa/_/snod du rung phyir gzhug par bya/_/rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis/_/nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde gshegs rnams/_/zla ba lta bur zhu byas
[\[5b.2\]]pas/_/de rnams dag phyir dbang bskur bya/_/de yi stobs kyis de dag rnams/_/bde dang yid bde thob pa dang /_/tha mal phung sogs bshigs pa'i phyir/_/zla ba lta bur zhu ba'o/_/de la mig la sogs pa rnams/_/k+ShaM dzaM khaM gaM skaM saM gyur/_/de bzhin gzugs
[\[5b.3\]]la sogs pa rnams/_/dzaHhUM baM hoHkhaM raM gyur/_/sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dag_/laM maM paM taM du ni gyur/_/gzugs sogs phung po'i bdag nyid rnams/_/buM AM dzaM khaM hUM du gyur/_/de las mtshan ma de yis mtshan/_/de rnams sa snying la sogs par/_/khams kun
[\[5b.4\]]'das par byas nas su/_/dris shing rtogs phul mi smra 'dug_/de ni pad+ma'i gzhal yas nas/_/phyi rol phyung nas bstod nas ni/_/sna tshogs pa yi gzugs kyis so/_/rang rang khams su 'phros par bsam/_/de nas bar ma'i sems can rnams/_/skar ma lhung
[\[5b.5\]]zhing zhal zhugs nas/_/rdo rjer phyung nas pad+mar gnas/_/shes rab chags pas de zhu byed/_/de yi 'od zer dmar 'phros pas/_/yab yum byang chub sems su zhu/_/de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs/_/glu yis bskul nas thim par byed/_/sems can khams na gnas kyi
[\[5b.6\]]dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/_/dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pa bdag la [(]bskab [,]bskyab [)]tu gsol/_/mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/_/sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_/rdo rje sku khyod
[\[5b.7\]]bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan/_/sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog tu rab tu phan par gzigs/_/mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/_/spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/khyod ni rdo rje gsung
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/_/'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/_/mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/_/spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/khyod ni rdo rje
[\[6a.2\]]'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan yon che/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs la/_/mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/_/yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/klu 'di
[\[6a.3\]]yis ni don byas nas/_/zhu ba phun sum tshogs bral ba/_/zla nyir gyur te yi ge hUM/_/rdo rje sngon po cung zad gdengs/_/des mtshan bshes gnyen zhu byas pas/_/sku dang zhal dbus mthing ka'i mdog_/g.yas dkar g.yon ni dmar po la/_/dam pa dang
[\[6a.4\]]po'i mtshan mar ldan/_/dam pa ma yin rnam rtog rnams/_/stong pa nyid du bsam byas te/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhen spang phyir/_/chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs/_/oM d+harma d+hA tu swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_sa snying rdo rje nam mkha' dang /_/dbang phyug sgrib
[\[6a.5\]]sel kun bzang rnams/_/k+ShiM la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/_/mig la sogs par dgod par bya/_/de bzhin snying mgrin mgo zla la/_/hUM AHoM las skyes pa yi/_/lte bar thugs rdo rje sogs bskyed/_/de rnams thugs ka nas byung ba'i/_/gzugs kyi
[\[6a.6\]]rdo rje sogs 'od kyis/_/ma lus rdo rje bsam mchod nas/_/byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba btab/_/dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/_/rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/_/phyogs
[\[6a.7\]]bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/_/rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swA b+hA wa badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan/_/rdo rje
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/_/rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar mdzod/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/_/rdo rje gsung can mdzad du
[\[6b.2\]]gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko \u0f85haM/_dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/_/rdo rje sku dang ldan par mdzod/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/
[\[6b.3\]]rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/_/rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi/_/'od kyis phyogs bcu'i mgon po bskul/_/de yi 'od zer las

[\[10a.1\]]po zhes bya ba ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid dam par dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par spangs pa'i sems tsam ni 'dir gti mug ste/_chos thams cad grub pa med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir/_/dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/_/phung po khams dang

[\[10b.4\]]gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas snying po phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar te/_bsam pa dang bsam par bya ba gnyis su med pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod
[\[10b.5\]]chags chen po ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do/_/de 'byung bar byed pa ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa ste/_/de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs so/_/dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'dod

[\[11a.1\]]don brtson bya/_/de yan chad ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to//_//da ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/de la gang gis dbang bskur zhe na/_dang por zhugs dang dang po pa/_/thams cad

[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]thams cad kyi rigs la rab tu chud do/_/de bas ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya'o/_/ye shes de khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na/_/dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de'i thabs 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong
[\[20a.2\]]ba rnams kyi mdun du ma smra shig_/khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro/_/snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas ni/_/de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/_/khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas/_/gal te tshul 'di 'das na ni/_/snying 'gas sdug bsngal de ltar 'byung /_/badzra sa twa hUM/_pad+ma'i ban+d+har
[\[20a.3\]]bdud rtsi lnga/_/yi ge gsum gyis 'bar byas la/_/rdo rje yis ni de yi khar/_/mi ldog phyir ni blud par bya/_/'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/_/dam las 'da' na sreg par byed/_/dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i/_/bdud rtsi rdo rje chu 'thung shig_/badzro da ka Tha/_de nas de yis mi 'gyur byas/_/sems
[\[20a.4\]]g.yo dogs phyir bstan pa yi/_/dam bcas 'di ni bla ma yis/_/lan gsum du ni bsgrags par bya/_/de ring phyin chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/_ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba thams cad khyod kyis bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis bdag la brnyas par mi rung ste/_/brnyas na ya nga ba ma spangs pas shi
[\[20a.5\]]ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bas ma 'gro shig_/de nas slob ma de yis kyang /_/brtan nas rang nyid dag bya'i phyir/_/gsol ba gdab pa 'di yi mchog_/smros shig ces ni bla mas smras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
[\[20a.6\]]cag la dbab du gsol lo/_/de yi snying ga ru ni hUM/_/laM byung dbang chen dbus su bsam/_/mgrin par a ni baM byung ba'i/_/chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su bsam/_/spyi bor haM ni dkar po che/_/yaM byung rlung dbus bsams nas ni/_/skul byed dz+haiM ni rkang mthil gnyis/_/rlung gis
[\[20a.7\]]bskyod pas 'bar byas dbab/_/oM A be+e sha ya staM b+ha ya ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya/_hUM a ha dz+hai/_rdo rje dril bu sgra dang bcas/_/'jigs rung gar gyis smin ring bskyod/_/mig bgrad so gtsigs bzhad byed pas/_/slob ma dbab pa rab tu bya/_/lce la thig le'i yi ge AH/_/bsams nas
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bzlas shing dge mi dge_/_bru hi badzra zhes brjod nas/_/dbab pa brtan par bya ba'o/_/pra ti badzra ho brjod la/_/me tog dkyil 'khor dor du gzhug_/de yis bcings par rab bsams la/_/blangs nas mgo ru bcing bar bya/_/'di ni stobs chen sems dpa' bas/_/'di yi ma
[\[20b.2\]]'dres so sor zung /_/phyag mtshan nye'am mi nye ba/_/re'u cha'i gnas las shes par bya'o/_/yang na rang gi skal ba yis/_/gdong phye me tog de la gtor/_/mig gnyis oM 'bar bsams nas ni/_/gdong phye las kyi kha dog bstan/_/de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/_/nan tan byas
[\[20b.3\]]te khyod mig phye/_/bla na med pa'i rdo rjes mig_/thams cad la ni mig phye 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor gtso bo nas brtsams nas/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil par bstan pa'am/_/yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las/_/gtso bo'i bar du bstan bya'o/_/slob mas thal mo sbyar byas la/_/rdo rje dkyil
[\[20b.4\]]'khor chen po yi/_/dkyil 'khor nyid du bdag zhugs so/_/sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/_/dkyil 'khor de ring bdag gis mthong /_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/_/dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/_/de skad lan gsum brjod par bya/_/bum pa rnams chu
[\[20b.5\]]gcig tu byas/_/mi bskyod rdo rje rab bskyed la/_/zhugs nas slob ma'i mgo bo ru/_/'khor los sgyur bzhin dbang bskur bya/_/rin chen la sogs dbu rgyan la/_/rin chen 'byung ldan gyur byas te/_/dbus su rang gi lha bzhag pas/_/cod pan dang ldan dbang bskur bya/_/rdo rje rtse mo dgu
[\[20b.6\]]lnga pa/_/'od dpag med bsgoms yongs gyur te/_/byin nas snying gar de bzung ba/_/rdo rje'i dbang ni bskur bar bya/_/dril bu don yod grub pa ru/_/bsgoms nas yongs gyur byin nas ni/_/rdo rje dril bu la 'khyud tshul/_/bdag por dbang ni bskur bar bya/_/spyi gtsug ltag pa la
[\[20b.7\]]bcug ste/_/spyi bor phyag reg ming gi dbang /_/che ge rdo rje zhes bos nas/_/khyad par gzhan yang mthong bar bya/_/gang gang snang ba kun bdag ste/_/de yi gtso bo mi bskyod mgon/_/chos rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pas/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge tshul/_/kun gyi gtso bo yin pa'i
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]phyir/_/ming gong dpal gyi sgra gzhug bya/_/go ba nyid du bsgrags pa'i phyir/_/dang po kye sbyor mtha' yi bar/_/hUM bskyed rdo rje lag byin nas/_/'chang bas rdo rje lan gsum gsor/_/brtul zhugs 'di ni dang po ru/_/rnal 'byor pa yis blang bar bya/_/
[\[21a.2\]]'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/_/rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste/_/lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi/_hi hi hi hi hUM/_de yi de nyid bshad par bya/_/sngon mtha' med pa'i
[\[21a.3\]]sems dpa' ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/_/kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag_/rdo rje snying po'i gtso bo'i gtso/_/a las byung ba'i dril bu ni/_/lag g.yon byin nas phyogs brgyad dkrol/_/brtul zhugs 'di yang dang po ru/_/de yi grogs su sbyin pa'o/_/'di ni
[\[21a.4\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/shes rab dbyangs chen 'khrol bar 'dod/_/rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste/_/rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu 'dod/_/de nyid bshad par bya ba ni/_/'di ni khyod kyis dkrol bya ste/_/srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed/_/
[\[21a.5\]]rang bzhin dag pas sems can kun/_/dam pa'i srid pa byed pa po/_/slob ma rdo rje dbyings phyug dang /_/ldan par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das/_/mngon byed 'das pa mchog 'di yis/_/phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin pa'o/_/phyag rgya chen po'i byin brlabs te/_/snying po bsnyen pa la sogs
[\[21a.6\]]grags/_/dam tshig 'dod gzugs sogs rnams kyis/_/sngags ni dbugs su rtogs nas bzla/_/rang gi rang bzhin de rnams kyis/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum khyab pa yi/_/ma lus gtso bo mchod byas nas/_/bdag dang gzhan yang mnyes par bya/_/dka' thub dam bcas de dag
[\[21a.7\]]gis/_/bstan par byas kyang 'grub pa med/_/mi snang mngon shes mkha' 'gro med/_/sku gsung thugs las grub skyes so/_/de bas sangs rgyas sems can rnams/_/sngags kyi spyod pa mchog bzung ste/_/'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas/_/chos kyi yi ge mchog thob 'gyur/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]bde sdug gnyis med bdag nyid kyis/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsten te/_/chags chen ye shes don sbyor na/_/de kho na nyid kun kyang 'grub/_/sku gsung thugs grub yang dag ste/_/gang gzhan dman pa yang skye 'dod/_/de yang sku gsung thugs bsgoms nas/_/sngags bzlas
[\[21b.2\]]pa yis 'grub pa'o/_/thun mong ma yin sdom par ldan/_/sbyor ba ma nyams yon phul nas/_/rdo rje slob dpon dbang nod phyir/_/de yis lan gsum gsol ba gdab/_/byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/_/mchod chen ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/_/
[\[21b.3\]]nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol/_/'jug pa'i sgo ru khru do bar/_/pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad la/_/sa bon gyis mtshan dbang stegs bri/_/seng ge mtshan par 'dug tu gzhug_/de nyid ting 'dzin gsum ldan par/_/byas nas bla ma'i lus dkyil 'khor/_/sangs rgyas sogs spro
[\[21b.4\]]rnam dgug cing /_/nam mkha'i khams kun dga' bar bya/_/de yis rnga dril sil snyen dang /_/rgyal mtshan 'phen sogs pheg rdob cing /_/bum pa gtso sogs gzung byas nas/_/sngon bzhin chu sogs dbang bskur bsam/_/dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/_/khams gsum kun gyis
[\[21b.5\]]phyag byas pa/_/gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin pa yin/_/de skad lan gsum brjod nas su/_/dge ba'i phyir dang shis pa'i phyir/_/bum pa spyi bor rab bzung ste/_/bkra shis dbyangs 'di brjod par bya/_/dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba/_/
[\[21b.6\]]'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum dang bral/_/bcom ldan pad rgyas lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/_/bkra shis des ni deng khyod zhi byed shog_/de yis bstan pa'i dri med mchog rab ni/_/'jig rten gsum grags lha dang mis mchod pa/_/cho ga skye dgu rnams ni zhi bar byed/_/bkra shis gnyis
[\[21b.7\]]pa deng 'dir khyed la shog_/dam pa'i chos ldan thos gang bkra shis shing /_/dge 'dun lha dang lha mi'i mchod 'os pa/_/ngo mtshar dpal rab mchog rab tshogs rnams kyi/_/bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyed la shog_/de nas de dag thams cad kun/_/ye shes ngo bor zhugs bsams
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]pas/_/dbu rgyan ye shes sems dpa' bskyed/_/bskor byas slob dpon gnas par bya/_/sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang /_/bdud rtsi myang ba yang byas nas/_/dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan bya/_/sangs rgyas ma rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir/_/gru bzhi
[\[22a.2\]]ru ni rab tu bstan/_/dran pa nyer bzhag shar gyi sgo/_/yang dag spong ba lho yi sgo/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nub kyi sgo/_/dbang po stobs ni byang gi sgo/_/bsam gtan bzhi ni twa ra Na/_/ting 'dzin rnams ni kha khyer brgyad/_/gzungs rnams der gnas lha mo'o/_/bsam pa bskang phyir
[\[22a.3\]]lha tshogs rgyan/_/gsung rab yan lag 'phags sogs so/_/byang chub yan lag dra ba sogs/_/rnam par thar brgyad ka ba brgyad/_/sngags tshul rdo rje phreng ba zlum/_/phyi logs rnam dag yon tan lnga/_/dri med stobs sogs mchod pa lnga/_/bum pa chus gang thugs rje dang /_/
[\[22a.4\]]tshogs rdzogs ser po ye shes gter/_/'gro ba rnams dang dbyer med kyang /_/de yi nyes pas mi gos phyir/_/sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu ni/_/sdong bu dang ni bcas pa'o/_/mi dge 'dam rdzab skam mdzad phyir/_/dge ba'i myu gu gso mdzad pa/_/nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun rnams so/_/nyon

[\[22a.6\]]phyir/_/gzhal yas khang du btags pa yin/_/snying po la ni 'dus pa'i phyir/_/dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/rnam par shes pa zhe sdang thugs/_/chos dbyings rnam dag mi bskyod pa/_/gzugs phung gti mug che dang sku/_/me long rnam dag rnam snang mdzad/_/tshor ba'i
[\[22a.7\]]phung po mnyam pa nyid/_/nga rgyal rnam dag rin chen 'byung /_/'du shes phung po 'dod chags gsum/_/so sor rtog pa snang mtha' yas/_/'du byed phung po nan tan dang /_/phrag dog rnam dag don yod grub/_/sa dang stong nyid thabs dang ni/_/snying rje zhi byed spyan ma'o/_/byams dang mtshan med
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]smon lam dang /_/chu khams srung byed mA ma kI/_/dga' dang smon med stobs dang ni/_/me khams rgyas byed na bza' dkar/_/btang snyoms ye shes rang bzhin gsal/_/rlung khams sgrol byed sgrol ma'o/_/sbyin pa rnam dag gzugs rdo rje/_/tshul khrims rnam dag sgra rdo rje/_/bzod
[\[22b.2\]]pa rnam dag dri rdo rje/_/brtson 'grus rnam dag ro rdo rje/_/bsam gtan rnam dag reg rdo rje/_/shes rab rnam dag chos rdo rje/_/phyi yi longs spyod kyis mchod phyir/_/dbyung sngags ting 'dzin gsungs pa'o/_/mi la sogs pa rnam dag phyir/_/de nyid du ni bkod par gsungs/_/dbyung
[\[22b.3\]]sngags ting 'dzin ma gsungs pas/_/sa snying la sogs phyir mi dgod/_/'jigs sogs shes bya phung po'i bdud/_/dad dag gshin rje gshed 'gugs pa/_/nyon mongs de bdud mthar 'dzin lha/_/brtson dag 'jug byed shes mthar byed/_/skye sgrib 'chi bdag log par lta/_/
[\[22b.4\]]dran dag 'ching byed rta mgrin no/_/las dang lha bdud mchog 'dzin lha/_/ting 'dzin mgu mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang /_/ngo bo nyid de rnam bzhi ni/_/thugs sogs rdo rje ye shes sems/_/phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin/_/rnam par rtog pa dang bral
[\[22b.5\]]phyir/_/gting dpag dka' bas zab mo ste/_/phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba/_/rang bzhin smin byed gsal ba po/_/zab mo dang ni yang dag gsal/_/shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid de/_/mtha' gnyis skyon ni rab bkag pas/_/dus thams cad du dbyer med do/_/de bzhin slob

[\[22b.7\]]ba'o/_/de ltar lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang /_/bka' stsal pa yis dbang bskur nas/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa kun bstan te/_/bka' lung g.yar gyi blang ba'o/_/bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o/_/lo 'am yang na zla ba ru/_/rig dang slob dpon dbang thob pas/_/lus dang
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]zang zing thabs dang bcas/_/spyod pa mchog gis bla ma bkur/_/rin chen sna bdun la sogs pa/_/rjes su mthun pa dbul bya ste/_/bla ma dgyes par byed pa'i ched/_/bu mo gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/_/rgyan ldan dam sdom dbang bcas pa/_/lus rgyas
[\[23a.2\]]mdzes pa dbul byas nas/_/bla ma'i g.yon du bu mo bzhag_/rgyal po mu stegs chom rkun gyis/_/gnod med dben pa'i sa phyogs su/_/mchog gi dris byugs pad sogs gdan/_/bla re rgyal mtshan sogs kyis bklubs/_/rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs sgras/_/gong gi
[\[23a.3\]]'khor ram yang na sku/_/tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po yis/_/dbyer med 'khor lo mchod byas nas/_/me tog snyim bkang gsol ba gdab/_/kun mkhyen ye shes phung po sogs/_/pus btsugs thal sbyar mgrin dma' bas/_/gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa che/_/yang dag
[\[23a.4\]]blangs nas bsrung bar bya/_/ji ltar dbang bskur sogs tshul gyis/_/sangs rgyas la sogs thob pa bzhin/_/byang chub spyod pa gzhan gyis ni/_/'dul ba'i dge ba de bzhin med/_/de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig_/rtag tu sdom pa yang skyongs shig_/sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga
[\[23a.5\]]bza' ste/_/de las gzhan yang dam tshig srungs/_/dkon mchog bla ma brnyas byed gzhom/_/gzhan gyi bud med spyad pa dang /_/ma byin par yang blangs byas nas/_/brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/_/rnal 'byor rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin/_/de ni cho ga bzhin du srungs/_/de ltar bya'o
[\[23a.6\]]zhes gsol nas/_/yang na me tog phreng ba gtor/_/thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba yi/_/dbang nod phyir ni gsol ba gdab/_/rdo rje sems khyod la sogs pa/_/tshigs bcad lnga yis lan gsum du/_/zhugs nas slob ma dam pa ni/_/mdzes pa'i chas ldan gyis bya'o/_/de nas bla
[\[23a.7\]]ma yon tan mtsho/_/mchog gi mchog gis de gsan nas/_/zhal ni mdangs dang ldan byas nas/_/snying rje de la bskyed par bya/_/gzugs sogs phun sum tshogs ldan pa'i/_/lha mo de ni byin brlabs nas/_/thub pa'i dbang po zhugs byas nas/_/rdo rje nang du gnas par bya/_/mthe
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]bo srin lag gis bkab nas/_/slob ma dpal ldan snang mdzad khar/_/spro ba'i sngags kyis phab nas su/_/gnyi gas 'di ni brjod par bya/_/a ho a ho su kha ho/_/gzhan yang blo yi bye brag gis/_/dbang bskur byas nas mgrin pa ru/_/de nyid myong bar byas nas su/_/de
[\[23b.2\]]nas 'di yis bsngags pa'o/_/de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi/_/dbang bskur mchog tu bsngags pa ste/_/thams cad sngags ni 'grub 'gyur te/_/las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub/_/zla ba za ba rab byung ba/_/lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal pa/_/'og nas 'byung
[\[23b.3\]]bzhin sbyin par bya/_/rdo rje bzlas pas phyi nang tshogs/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu la sogs pa'i/_/'dod don phyag mtshan mdog dang dbyibs/_/bsam mi khyab pa'i rnam smin sku/_/bsgom pa la gnas de bsgom gzhug_/gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'o/_/de bzhin gong ma'i rim pa yis/_/
[\[23b.4\]]mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig pa che/_/btsal te bla ma dag la yon/_/rjes mthun dang bcas dbul bar bya/_/sngon bzhin gsol btab sdom pa blangs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin te/_/sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na/_/phyag 'tshal na ni ma rung
[\[23b.5\]]'gyur/_/kun du rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/_/sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya/_/mdor na sems can thams cad ni/_/bsam gtan rdo rje bskul bar bya/_/de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi/_/dam chos rab tu
[\[23b.6\]]bstan pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor dag kyang yang mi bri/_/glegs bam bklag par mi bya zhing /_/mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/_/rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya/_/gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo /_/de ltar bya zhes gsol bar bya/_/yang ni me tog gtor
[\[23b.7\]]byas nas/_/mchod sbyin rdo rje la sogs pa'i/_/tshigs bcad lan gsum gsol btab nas/_/shes rab ye shes yang dag blang /_/de nas lha mo bdag nyid dang /_/dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog smras nas/_/bde chen za ma tog gi ni/_/lha mo'i bsngags pa rab tu brjod/_/de dag
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]mdun du gnas pa'i lag_/g.yas g.yon 'og dang steng bzhag nas/_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha mo 'di/_/sngags 'di yis ni sbyin par bya/_/yid 'ong gzugs ma 'di nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod du gnang /_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rim pa yis/_/
[\[24a.2\]]dam pa'i bde ba khyod kyis myong /_/de nas rab mnyam bzhag pa yis/_/dal ba'i bya ba rnam gsum gyis/_/rdo rje skyil krung nang du sems/_/rin chen dkyil du rtogs pa bya/_/rang gi lha yi 'khor lor ldan/_/dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang 'brel pa/_/yol bas bcad de bde myong la/_/
[\[24a.3\]]sngon bzhin dbang bskur byas nas thim/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_gti mug rang bzhin gti mug sbyor/_/gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan/_/gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/gti mug rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/zhe sdang rang bzhin zhe sdang sbyor/_/
[\[24a.4\]]zhe sdang dga' ma dang ldan par/_/zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/'dod chags rang bzhin 'dod chags sbyor/_/'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan/_/'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/'dod chags rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/
[\[24a.5\]]shes rab ye shes bdag sbyar na/_/rdo rje dga' ma dang ldan par/_/ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur/_/shes rab ye shes so/_/de nas bla mas g.yon pa yi/_/phyag ni slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag_/de bzhin gshegs kun dpang byas la/_/
[\[24a.6\]]rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/_/thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/_/de bas rig ma 'di ni mchog_/chos kun gnyis su med pa la/_/gnyis kyis rnam par mtshon pa yin/_/de bas rtag tu 'khor ba ru/_/khyed kyis 'bral bar ma byed cig_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/
[\[24a.7\]]rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/_/blun chen gang zhig 'da' byed na/_/mchog gi dngos grub de la med/_/de ltar de bzhin gzhir yang /sngon bzhin gnyis ni rgyas btab pas/_/gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' 'dra ba'i/_/man ngag tu ni de nyid brtag_/bla ma de bzhin
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]gshegs gyur na/_/snying gar khu tshur chos gos g.yon/_/g.yas pas mchog sbyin phyag rgya bya/_/bdag nyid bzhengs nas lung ston bya/_/oM khyod la bdag gis lung 'di ston/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/srid pa'i ngan 'gro thar byas nas/_/yang dag srid pa
[\[24b.2\]]grub pa'i phyir/_/sa bla sa steng sa 'og tu/_/kye rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba/_/rang byung rang nyid grub gyur cig_/sngags pa gang la lung 'di bstan/_/de ni 'gro ba kun gyi gtso/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub la/_/bde gshegs kun gyis lung bstan yin/_/lung bstan pa'o/_/ji
[\[24b.3\]]ltar dbang bskur thob pa yis/_/slob mas yon tan brjod par mos/_/dam tshig gsum gyis dbugs phyung nas/_/'di yis bsngags pa brjod pa'o/_/dam tshig gsang chen dkyil 'khor la/_/rab tu zhugs nas mthong bas na/_/khyod ni sdig pa kun las grol/_/de ring shin tu
[\[24b.4\]]kho nar gnas/_/bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/_/phyin chad shi ba yong med de/_/mi thub mi shigs gzhan gyis kyang /_/rol zhing 'jigs par ga la 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal srid las mya ngan 'das/_/srid pa gtan du dag pa'i phyir/_/yang dag 'byung ba ston pa'i mchog_/srid pa
[\[24b.5\]]gtan du dngos grub po/_/dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di/_/rig ma rtag tu bsrung bar bya/_/dam pa'i shes rab bstan pa ni/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs/_/byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/_/gang zhig rdo rje phyag rgya zhes/_/de ni bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas
[\[24b.6\]]nyid du the tshom med/_/dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya/_/ma rig pa dang gti mug gis/_/de ni bor bar mi bya'o/_/rang bdag yongs su spangs pa dang /_/dka' thub sdug bsngal gzir mi bya/_/ji ltar bde ba 'di bzung nas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa 'di las 'byung /_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag

[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]'gros gtses dang bzung ba dang /_/bgegs dang tshogs bdag drag po yis/_/bsad nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/_/mchog gi dge ba mngon 'gyur ba'i/_/rdo rje slob dpon bla chen la/_/nam yang brnyas par byar mi rung /_/

[\[25a.4\]]dang bcas sangs rgyas kyis/_/de ring khyed rnams dbang bskur bas/_/rgyal po chen po khams gsum na/_/rgyal po gtso bo brtan par 'gyur/_/de ring bdud rnams rnam bcom nas/_/gzhal yas khang mchog du chud phyir/_/sangs rgyas nyid phyir de kho nar/_/khyab bdag gis ni

[\[25a.6\]]dbugs dbyung ba'o/_/de nas slob mas phyag 'tshal te/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/sogs pa'i tshig gis thams cad kun/_/gnang ba'i dbang ni blang bar bya/_/ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/_/sems can rang bzhin du 'gro bgyis/_/de lta de ltar sems can don/_/'dod
[\[25a.7\]]chags la sogs dag par bya/_/nyin re yi ni mtshams gsum la/_/ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan ni/_/bsgrubs nas sgrub pa thun mong dang /_/cig shos dngos grub bsgrub par bya/_/mi snang stong ni chung ngu la/_/mngon shes nyi stong bar ma la/_/rig 'dzin dag ni stong gsum
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]la/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro kun gtso/_/zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las gang /_/de las gzhan nam gang 'dod la/_/dkyil 'khor kun du chags sbyor na/_/bsgrub pa myur du 'grub par 'ong /_/rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis/_/'dod chags de nyid don bsams te/_/sems can thams
[\[25b.2\]]cad phan byed pa'i/_/byang chub 'dod chags las skyes mdzad/_/de bas byang chub 'dod bsngags pas/_/sku gsung thugs ni bsgom byas te/_/cho ga bzhin du las byed na/_/de kun rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/de dag byang chub thob 'dod kun/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis
[\[25b.3\]]thams cad dbul/_/gang zhig phongs pas yid mi bde/_/dad pa'i mchog ldan de yin no/_/bka' stsal pa'i dbang ngo /_/dad pa mchog tu gus ldan pas/_/bla ma'i zhabs ni spyi bor blang /_/ji ltar rje btsun bka' stsal ltar/_/de ltar bya zhes spyan sngar gsol/_/bkra
[\[25b.4\]]shis smon lam dang ldan par/_/yang dag gnas par gyur cig brjod/_/snod rung byas pa'i slob ma la/_/bla ma shin tu dgyes pa na/_/de dag kun las gsang ba dang /_/rab gsang shin tu gsang ba yi/_/bsgrags min mna' yis btab byas nas/_/som nyi med par bshad
[\[25b.5\]]par bya/_/'byor ldan slob ma kun tshogs nas/_/sbyin sreg gnas su gnas byas nas/_/bla ma slob ma sbyor bar ldan/_/mar la sogs pa rgya chen rnams/_/slob mas g.yon pa'i mthe bong ni/_/bla ma'i g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang /_/gung mo yis ni gzung byas nas/_/sdig pa
[\[25b.6\]]rnams ni zhi bar bya/_/de bzhin de ru sa bdag dang /_/phyogs skyong rgyal po la sogs pa/_/zhi bar bya phyir bdun nam ni/_/yang na gsum mam gcig tu bya'o/_/bdag nyid bshad dang nyan pa dang /_/bsam dang bsgom dang dngos grub bsgrub/_/tha na 'jig rten las grub dang /_/khyod kyis

[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]dril bu gsil nas pus mo btsugs/_/ye shes 'khor lo thams cad kun/_/sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol ba'o/_/oM sems can kun don mdzad nas su/_/dngos grub stsal te rigs pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/_/
[\[26a.2\]]yang ni 'byon par mdzod cig muH/_/de bzhin oM dang AH dang hUM/_/brjod pas ting 'dzin 'khor lo rnams/_/rdo rje gsum la bsdu byas nas/_/de yang nam mkha' lta bur mos/_/oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/_Ad+ya nu t+pa n+na t+w+'+ta oM AHhUM swA hA zhes brjod pas/_gzugs brnyan

[\[26a.5\]]dang po rnal 'byor pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga dang por gsungs/_/gzhan du khyad par ma gtogs pa/_/cho ga rgyas par 'dir shes bya/_/cung zad ye shes dbang thob pas/_/'bebs pa'i cho gas bri bar gsungs/_/khams gsum skye bos smon 'dzugs phyir/_/rnam pa gzhan du

[\[26a.7\]]dang bzhin mdzes shing /_/so yi thags bzang rab gtsang ba/_/skra gnag mig dkyus ring ba dang /_/rang bzhin dul ba rig pa che/_/bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag_/de la gong du smos pa dang /_/snod rung sogs kyis zhus nas su/_/de rnams don du tshogs skyed phyir/_/rnam par

[\[27a.1\]]pa'i/_/bri ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/_/sgrub pa la yang ri mo ni/_/tshul 'di dang ni mtshungs zhes bya/_/ye shes dbang sgyur rnal 'byor pas/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog las rgyal mchog_/rdzogs pa'i bsam gtan

[\[27b.1\]]ye shes kyi ni 'khor lo la/_/gnyis med 'khor lo gzhug par bya/_/de nas byin gyis brlabs brjod la/_/sa bcu'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la/_/dngos grub rtags ni shes bya'i phyir/_/me tog 'dod par bya ba ste/_/sku'am dbus su nub gyur na/_/phyag rgya chen po bsgrub

[\[27b.5\]]bstan dbugs dbyung dang /_/bka' stsal pa rnams rim bzhin dbang /_/de yis de yi byang chub ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub che/_/sems can thams cad phan 'dod pas/_/ngo mtshar chen po rab tu grub/_/bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/_/mchod dang
[\[27b.6\]]dbang bskur de bzhin du/_/byas nas gzhan la 'ga' yi don/_/bsgrub phyir lung 'di bsgo ba'o/_/nga yis khyed ni dkyil 'khor du/_/bcug zin dbang bskur yang zin gyis/_/khyod kyis slob dpon sgrub po las/_/'dod bzhin du ni gyis shig ces/_/gnang nas bsnyen la

[\[28a.1\]]yal bar mi 'dor phyir/_/snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/_/dag sogs cho ga sngon 'gro ba'i/_/phyi yi bya ba bsten bya ste/_/ye shes cung zad dbang gyur ltar/_/ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/_/dbang bskur yang dag brtsam bya ste/_/gnyis med man

[\[28a.7\]]'ba' zhig las 'byung ste/_/mtshams kyi rnam shes ji lta dang /_/klu khros pa yi sems bzhin du/_/mi mthun ltar yang snang ba ste/_/de bas sems nyid rtogs par bya/_/rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to//_//da ni dngos

[\[28b.1\]]grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/de la sgrub pa po'i gang zag ni/_/brtul zhugs sdom pa sngags ldan pa/_/mi brtan lha yi nga rgyal bral/_/cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa/_/thun mong sgrub pa shes par bya/_/rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa rnams/_/sgyu 'drar sems can

[\[28b.5\]]sgrub pa po yis rab nges bya/_/rjes su mthun pa'i shis pa'i zas/_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang /_/chu dang shel dang sman dang dri/_/phyag rgya chen po rig 'dzin gyis/_/lam la mkhas pa rnams kyis sngags/_/glang chen sha yis mngon shes bsgrub/_/rta yi sha yis mi snang bsgrub/_/'gugs pa
[\[28b.6\]]ba lang sha yis bsgrub/_/khyi sha yis ni thams cad bsgrub/_/nus pa yis ni dgug par bya/_/med na bsam pas rnam par brtag/_/ngo bo nyid dang mthun dag dang /_/rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/_/de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes/_'dod

[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/_/rmongs pa'i man ngag sems 'da'o/_/mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang /_/dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang /_/rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag kyang /_/dam tshig 'di yis rnam par grub/_/grub pa yi ni mtshan ma ni/_/shin tu
[\[29a.2\]]'bebs pa thob pa yis/_/gdon mi za bar 'grub 'gyur te/_/bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag rdzogs/_/spyi yi mtshan mar shes par bya/_/bzlas dang bsgom dang rang lha yi/_/khyad par gang yin rtogs par mdzad/_/rmi lam bye brag rab byed pas/_/so so'i mtshan ma shes par bya/_/
[\[29a.3\]]bsam gtan ngag gi bzlas pa yis/_/dus sam byin rlabs rab sdud du/_/'dod pas rnyed pa'i mtshan ma ni/_/rmi lam du ni shes par bya/_/rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs tha dad par mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na bdag nyid ye shes mchog thob nas sangs
[\[29a.4\]]rgyas thams cad dang mthu mnyam par mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rgyud dag pa la snang bar bdag nyid mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang drag pa sogs pas bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod par mthong ba dang /_
[\[29a.5\]]rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyi nang gi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bdag la mchod par mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'am/_rtag pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na rdo rje gsum mam spyan ma la sogs
[\[29a.6\]]pa'am/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag la btud cing phyag 'tshal bar mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na mngon dga' la sogs pa'i zhing du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang /_de dag kyang thugs rab tu dgyes nas chos kyi mdzod chen po gtad par mthong ba dang /_rmi
[\[29a.7\]]lam na bdag nyid shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i gzugs lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskor zhing chos bshad par mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na bdag nyid la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis nam mkha' la gdugs dkar po bteg cing /_seng ge'i khri la
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bzhag nas chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na gdol ba'i bu mo'am/_khyi'am/_rta rgod ma la sogs pa'am/_snyoms par 'jug pa de dag phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/gzhan yang rmi lam na kha dog sna tshogs pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mos
[\[29b.2\]]tshal yid du 'ong ba mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na lha'i bu mo gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_snyan cha dang /_mgur chu dang /_nu 'bur dang /_zur phud la sogs pas brgyan pa dang /_mi'i khye'u dang bu mo yid du 'ong ba bcu drug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ba ni thun mong gi 'grub pa'i
[\[29b.3\]]mtshan ma'o/_/rigs 'dzin la sogs yongs smin las/_/'dzam bu gser 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de bas de dag thams cad kun/_/cig shos mtshan mar shes par bya/_/sngon du bya ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ni/_sngags pa rnam par dag pa yis/_/de dag rab tu rtogs
[\[29b.4\]]byas nas/_/sngon gyi phyir na gnyis kyis kyang /_/ci rigs gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya/_/dben par gtsang gtor byas nas su/_/bgegs bskrad sa la gsol ba btab/_/cig shos la yang gsol byas nas/_/bka' stsal sa ni brko bar bya/_/sngon gyi rim pa shes byas
[\[29b.5\]]la/_/sa stengs rgyan dang ldan pa dang /_/dag bya'i phyir na gong bzhin du/_/dbang bskur blang bas yid sbyang bya/_/rdo rjes khyad par byas pa yis/_/sa 'dzin lta bur byin brlabs la/_/bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsum gnas pas/_/de dbus nga rgyal gsum ldan bya/_/sngon bzhin rtag sogs
[\[29b.6\]]gsol btab nas/_/byin brlabs stangs thabs brtsam pa'o/_/phur bus btab nas sa srung ste/_/nub gcig sta gon gnas par bya/_/lha rnams gnas par byas nas su/_/brod bskyed mchod pa sna tshogs brtsam/_/dgongs par bya phyir gong ma bzhin/_/'khor lo gsol
[\[29b.7\]]ba gdab par bya/_/lha mo bzhi dang mi bskyod pa/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa ni/_/rdzas dang ldan par sta gon bya/_/yod na bcu dgu nges pa'o/_/skud pa tshon rtsi 'dus byas la/_/sngon bzhin 'bebs ba'i cho ga bya/_/de yis thig dang tshon btab nas/_/zhal sogs ldan pa'i
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]phyag rgya dgod/_/gzhan la ma thos sems can rnams/_/gzung bar bya phyir sngon bzhin bshad/_/gnas rnams stong ba mi mdzes pas/_/dang chung srid pas de ma bsngags/_/mi rnams kyis ni phye ma yis/_/zhal la sogs pa rdzogs mi 'gyu/_/yan

[\[30a.3\]]bya phyir lha rnams la/_/ji srid rdzas kyi thab rnams su/_/sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes bya'o/_/slob ma gzhug pa'i rim pa bzhin/_/bdag nyid 'khor lor zhugs par bya/_/sdig bshags me tog 'dor ba'i bar/_/byas nas lha rnams kyis gnang ba'i/_/sngon bzhin bum pa gsang ba
[\[30a.4\]]dang /_/shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs dang /_/lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal thob/_/de yis bsgrub pa brtsam pa'o/_/sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhe na/_dang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/rig 'dzin sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/_/ji bzhin byas pa'i sngags pa yis/_/thun
[\[30a.5\]]mong cig shos bgegs bsal nas/_/spyi gzugs gyur nas rtag pa las/_/byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsgom/_/lnga dang bzhi las mchog dang po/_/rab bskyed skye rim bzhi spangs nas/_/dri za rab tu zhugs byas pas/_/de ni cho ga bzhin du zhu/_/rang gi tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi/_/
[\[30a.6\]]mA ma kI la sogs gyur nas/_/bskul te thim gyur sa bon gyur/_/phyag mtshan des mtshan bshes gnyen zhugs/_/de las rtag pa sngon bzhin bskyed/_/de yi thugs kar zla ba la/_/oM las 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/_/bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/_/oM d+harma d+hA tu
[\[30a.7\]]swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_gnyis sogs ma gtogs de phyag rgyas/_/gnas nas sngags 'di bsgom par bya/_/oM AH oM dzin dzika hUM/_/brjod pas oM las 'od zer tshogs/_/dkar ba'i rgyun gyis nang gsal te/_/ba spu'i bu ga nas spros pa'i/_/'od rtse rtag pa'i tshogs rnams
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]kyis/_/nam mkha'i khams kun bkang byas nas/_/sangs rgyas rtag pa spyan drangs nas/_/rang gi ba spu'i bu gar gzud/_/brtan pa'i ngo bos phyag byas nas/_/yang nas yang du dus bzhir bsgom/_/de nas zhag bdun la sogs nas/_/nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni/_/'byung

[\[30b.3\]]ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/_/thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te/_/'od dpag med bsgoms mgrin pa ru/_/AH las pad+ma AHyis mtshan/_/bsams nas bzlas brjod yang bya'o/_/oM AHA ro l-ika hUM/_/de yis sngon bzhin 'od dpag med/_/spros te bkug

[\[30b.6\]]shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/_/ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba/_/ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur/_/rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/_/thams cad sngon bzhin rab gnas te/_/mi bskyod cho ga bzhin bskyed nas/_/thugs kar rdo rje bum pa ru/_/oM bsams bzlas brjod bya ba'o/_/oM
[\[30b.7\]]d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na rastu hUM/_mi bskyod tshogs bkug sngon bzhin du/_/zhugs nas chags byas nye bar mthong /_/gtor ma btang nas rab bsgrubs nas/_/zla phyed mi bskyod 'dra ba thob/_/mi bskyod pa yi sku dag dang /_/gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin/_/'jig rten khams rnams
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]thams cad du/_/mi bskyod rdo rje mchod par 'gyur/_/rin chen 'byung ldan sngon bzhin bskyed/_/thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i/_/oM bzlas pa yis 'grub pa'o/_/de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya/_/oM AH oM sa man+ta dz+nyA na rastu hU~M/_de yis rin chen 'byung

[\[31a.5\]]sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o/_/oM AHoM kri ta a nuSh+Tha na dz+nyA na rastu hUM/_de yis don yod grub pa'i tshogs/_/spros te bkug byas zhugs byas la/_/gnas brtan ngo bor chags byas na/_/zla ba phyed na de dag 'grub/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba 'ong /_/de ni
[\[31a.6\]]dpal ldan ye shes mtsho/_/sems can don kun 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin snang mdzad bsgom byas te/_/sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o/_/oM AHoM A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra rastu hUM/_sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas nas/_/zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'grub/_/thams cad snga ma bzhin
[\[31a.7\]]byas te/_/snang mdzad mgo mgrin thugs ka ru/_/'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje la/_/zla ba'i dbus nas oM gsum gnas/_/oM AHoM oM oM tri ga ka ra ya rastu hUM/_de yis rdo rje gsum gyi tshogs/_/bkug nas gnas gsum du brtan par/_/byas nas nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong /_/gong bzhin
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]byas na zla phyed 'grub/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/sangs rgyas snang mdzad 'dra ba'i mdog_/de ni byang chub ye shes dang /_/sku gsum ye shes 'grub par 'gyur/_/de yi rim pas mi bskyod sogs/_/rang rang ngo bos rab bsgrubs na/_/dpal ldan zla ba phyed grub nas/_/

[\[31b.4\]]zer gyis bkug rtag dkyil 'khor/_/bsdus te bcug nas brtan byas pas/_/drod dang dud 'thul 'bar ba dang /_/nam mkha' la ni 'phar bar 'gyur/_/de yi steng du su bsams nas/_/lag tu babs nas spyan mas bzla/_/'byung po rnams la gtor sbyin la/_/chags byas zla
[\[31b.5\]]ba phyed nas 'grub/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun/_/de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_/sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje dngos byas hUM bskyed de/_/rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo bsgom/_/sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya
[\[31b.6\]]ba'o/_/oM AH badzra d+h+r-ika badzra ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/_rdo rje rigs kyi spro dang bsdu/_/brtan par byas la chags byas nas/_/sngon bzhin rab tu bsgrub gyur na/_/zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/_/de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams/_/
[\[31b.7\]]yon tan can gyi bdag gir 'gyur/_/drag po dag gis phyag byas pas/_/khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur/_/sngon bzhin rgyas par rin chen 'byung /_/bsgoms nas swa bskyed rin chen dngos/_/rin chen rigs kyi lha bsgoms la/_/sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o/_/oM
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]AH rat+na d+h+r-ika rat+na ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/_rin chen rigs kyi lha rnams kun/_/spro zhing bsdu bas brtan byas nas/_/nye ba'i mtshan mthong sngon bzhin bsgoms/_/zla ba phyed 'grub the tshom med/_/ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/_/bskal ba gsum gyi yun gnas shing /_/

[\[32a.3\]]swA hA/_de spros gsung gi rigs bkug nas/_/bcug nas brtan bya yang yang bsgom/_/mtshan ma thob nas gtor ma btang /_/zla ba phyed na de 'grub 'gyur/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed la/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid
[\[32a.4\]]'jog par byed/_/don yod grub pa sngon bzhin bsgom/_/ral gri dngos byas ha las bskyed/_/las kyi lha rnams yu bar bsgom/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam pa'o/_/oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+r-ika khad+ga ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/_las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro/_/bsdu zhing bcug nas chags

[\[32a.6\]]dang bsam pa dag_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje thugs las rab byung ba/_/de lta bu yi dngos grub ster/_/'khor lo la sogs grub pa'i mchog_/sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/gang gA'i bye snyed thams cad du/_/grub pa kun du rnam par spyod/_/dam tshig
[\[32a.7\]]dam pa thams cad kyi/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/_/rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas/_/de ni dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur/_/thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te/_/'jam dpal bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs/_/thugs kar ral gri'i yu ba la/_/haM gi 'od ldan bzlas brjod bya/_

[\[32b.1\]]oM AHhaM many+dzu shrI hUM phaT/_de yi 'od kyis nang gsal nas/_/ba spu las byung 'od zer lngas/_/thams cad 'jam dpal skur byas te/_/bkug cing bu gar thim par bya/_/yang nas yang du brtan byas pas/_/ba spu dbang po gzhu mthong nas/_/'byung po gtor byin chags byas
[\[32b.2\]]na/_/zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub/_/'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' de 'gyur ro/_/yang ni 'jam dpal de bzhin bsgom/_/ral gri yu bar bcug 'phan gnas/_/bzlas
[\[32b.3\]]brjod byas la gong bzhin dpag_/de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya/_/oM AHth+liM many+dzu hUM swA hA/_de ni zla ba phyed na yang /_/'od zer 'bar bar gyur pa yin/_/rdul phran rdo rje lus ngag gi/_/rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/snga ma bzhin du kun shes bya/_/gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu/_/
[\[32b.4\]]longs spyod dang po rdzogs pa la/_/mtshan ma yis ni de 'dra 'grub/_/tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang /_/rdo rje lcags kyu dbyug gsal zhing /_/ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje rnams/_/dngos byas 'khor lo gcig bsgom brjod/_/oM AHya mAn+ta kr-ita mud+ha ra sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AHp+r+dz+ny+'+n+ta kr-ita badz+ha d+ha na da sid+d+hi
[\[32b.5\]]hUM/_oM AHpad+man+ta kr-ita pad+ma sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AH big+h+r+nA kr-ita badzra sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AHTak+ki rA dza aM ku sha sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AHnI la daN+Da'i daN+Da sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AHma hA ba la tri shU la sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AHa tsa la khad+ga sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AHtsakra warti tsakra sid+d+hi hUM/_oM AH su b+ha badzro sid+d+hi hUM/_de yis khro bo'i
[\[32b.6\]]tshogs bkug ste/_/bcug nas brtan par byas nas su/_/sngon bzhin gtor sogs kyis bsgrub na/_de 'dra zla ba phyed na 'grub/_/yang na rtag pa 'od dpag med/_/mi bskyod pa yi mtshan ma rnams/_/bsgrubs te rang gi lha bcug pas/_/zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/mi snang ba

[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]par zhugs la/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug par bya/_/bgegs bzlog cho ga nas brtsams te/_/brgyad kyis nam mkha' snying po bskyed/_/chos dbyings byin rlabs lus kun la/_/gnas bzhi ma gtogs khaM gis mtshan/_/oM AH khaM na kha gar+b+ha hUM/_
[\[33a.2\]]de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/_/nam mkha'i snying po'i skur byas la/_/bkug ste khaM kun la bstims la/_/nam mkha' bzhin du stong par bsam/_/bdag gi yan lag mi mthong sogs/_/'byung po gtor ma yang byin te/_/chags byas yad du bsgrub 'gyur na/_/zla ba
[\[33a.3\]]phyed na mi snang 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/yang dang yang du mchod pa dang /_/bskal pa gcig tu gnas pa dang /_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs 'gyur/_/gzhi yi 'bras bu gzhan yin phyir/_/de bshad gsang ba'i thig le las/_/rim pa 'di
[\[33a.4\]]bzhin tshig 'grub pa/_/'jig rten dbang po bsgrub pa bshad/_/thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bsgom par bya/_/de lce hrIHlas pad+ma ni/_/'dab brgyad mdun du rdo rje ni/_/oM AHhrIHlo ke shwa ra b+ha d+ha na ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/_bzlas pa thos pas sangs
[\[33a.5\]]rgyas rnams/_/'jig rten dbang ni bskur byas te/_/bkug ste lce la bcug nas ni/_/gnas brtan ngo bor chags par bya/_/lce de rdo rje mthong gyur nas/_/gtor ma byin te yang yang bsgom/_/zla ba phyed na nges pa ru/_/tshig gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub/_/bden pa ru ni smra ba
[\[33a.6\]]dang /_/shags dang rgol ba sun 'byin dang /_/kun thos rnams ni yid 'ong bar/_/'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/_/de las yang ni sgrub pa'i mchog_/mtshon cha rnams ni 'jig 'gyur ba/_/phyi mas gsungs pa 'byung ba'i phyir/_/de yi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad/_/sngon
[\[33a.7\]]gsungs rgyas par bshad pa yi/_/cho ga rnams ni rdzogs byas la/_/klu shing me tog mtshan pa yi/_/snang mdzad 'dra ba'i byams pa bskyed/_/thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i/_/me ni cho ga bzhin bsgoms la/_/bzlas brjod byas pas byams pa yi/_/tshogs kyis
[\[33b\]]

[\[51a.3\]]wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/_ma hA daM Sh+T+rA+o Ta/_/ka Ta b+hai ra ba ya/_a si mu sa la pa ra shu/_bA sha hastA ya/_oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/_/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_/ha na ha na/_pa tsa pa tsa/_gardza gardza/_bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/_sarba big+h+nAM/_bi nA ya ka naM/_che ge mo uts+tsha ta ya
[\[51a.4\]]phaT/_de yang phyag 'tshal mjug tu yang /_/bskul ba 'di ni bya ba dang /_/phyag 'tshal bskul dang bod pa dang /_/las brgyad de dag tu shes bya/_/de ltar bsngags nas ras ma de/_/ma mo la sogs gnas su sba/_/sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod byed na/_/bgegs kyi gnod pa smos

[\[86b.5\]]skye ba med pa bstan pa'i mdo las/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni sems tsam mo/_/de yang kun rdzob nyid de/_don dam par mi dmigs so zhes 'byung ba dang /_de nyid las de bas na gang nges par legs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pas rnam par shes pa kun rdzob nyid du shes
[\[86b.6\]]par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du mdo gzhan dag las kyang /_rang bzhin med de rnam rig med/_/dngos po yang med gzhi yang med/_/ro dang 'dra ba'i mi mkhas pa/_/byis pas 'di dag brtags pa'o/_/zhes pa la sogs pa'o/_/bcom ldan

[\[87a.1\]]'byor pa med pa gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/zhes pa la sogs pa de dang de la rnam pa mang po gsungs so/_/de ltar rnam par shes pa kun rdzob nyid du shes na yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su rtog pa ni rigs pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khor
[\[87a.2\]]ba'i chos ni med pa'i phyir ro/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /_mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni/_/sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags/_/rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_sa ni spyan zhes bya ba dang /_/chu yi khams ni
[\[87a.3\]]mA ma kI/_/dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba/_/me dang rlung du rab tu grags/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'o na srid par snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa'i dngos po 'di 'khor ba ma yin nam de med na mya ngan las 'das pa yang gang la yod ce na/_de'i phyir bla ma chen po'i zhal snga nas/_bdag tu
[\[87a.4\]]'dzin dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yis/_/'khor ba 'di ni btags pa tsam du yang /_/de yi ngo bo log pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/kun las 'das pa'i ngo bor shes par bya/_/zhes gsungs te/_de bas na srid pa'i chos ni gtan nas yod par mi 'dod kyi/_'on kyang log par

[\[87a.6\]]gzhan na yod pa min/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na de zlog par byed pa'i thabs su 'dir zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor de gsungs pa yin no/_/de skad du dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/_gsang ba'i
[\[87a.7\]]bdag po thag pa'i sbrul gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin no/_/'on kyang rab rib kyis de ltar snang ba yin no/_/skyes bu gang gis rab rib spangs te brtags na thag par mthong zhing don gzhan med do/_/gsang ba'i bdag po de bzhin du rtag pa la sogs pa la/_gzugs la sogs par
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]snang ba gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin no/_/'on kyang gzugs la sogs par zhen pa'i bag chags kyi phyir ro/_/skyes bu la la zhig gis ngas bstan pa'i lam la gzhol zhing bag chags de bzlog nas rtag pa la sogs par mthong zhing gzhan ci yang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs
[\[87b.2\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na de med pa'i phyir 'di thams cad zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de la zab mo gang zhe na/_rang 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang /_gdod ma nas bral ba mi dmigs shing mi 'gyur ba'o/_/yang dag par gsal ba gang zhe
[\[87b.3\]]na/_de'i sgo nas phun sum tshogs pa yod pa gzhan la ston pa'i rkyen 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen por snang ba thams cad do/_/de bas na de'i ngo bor gsal bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu dam pa zhig gis gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i
[\[87b.4\]]rgyud las gsungs pa'i lam gyi rim pa la nye bar gnas nas rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim gyis 'jug cing rtogs par bya'o/_/de'i rim pa bla ma'i zhal snga nas brgyud cing 'byung ba cung zad bdag gis dbye bar bya'o/_/de'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste/_de la dang por 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad spangs pa'i
[\[87b.5\]]rnal 'byor pas tshogs la 'jigs pa'i skyon med pa/_snying rje chen po dang de las byung ba'i yon tan dang ldan pas bla ma dam pa rnams las gang yang rung ba cig mnyes par byas te/_cho ga ma tshang ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis gang yang rung bar zhugs nas/_bum pa dang gsang ba dang /_
[\[87b.6\]]shes rab ye shes kyi dbang rnams thob pas gsang ba dang mchog tu gsang ba la sogs pa rim par bya ste/_ji ltar gsungs ba'i gnas su dang por bya bar 'os pa rnams tshogs par bya ste/_des mtshams bzhi'i dang po tho rangs la sgo dag par bya ba la sogs pa nas/_rjes su
[\[87b.7\]]chags pa'i mtha' la thug pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_thig le dang phra mo dang bzlas brjod byas nas 'khor lo bsdu ba brtsam mo/_/de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de'i yan lag gzhan smon lam btab pa dang /_
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]sdom pa bskyang ba dang /_kha zas sbyang ba dang /_las gnyis kyi sgo nas sems can gyi don bya ba dang /_brjed pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i cho ga byas nas/_brtags pa'i mtshan nyid las dben par bya zhing rang gi sems
[\[88a.2\]]nyid dag par bya'o/_/de kho na bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang /_phyi 'bred kyi dus su yang de thams cad ma lus par brtsam par bya'o/_/nam phyed la yang de bzhin du bzlas pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar byas nas/_nyal bar 'dod na gshegs su gsol ba dang /_snying ga'i gnas su ye
[\[88a.3\]]shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo la phyi rol 'khor lo bsdus nas shes rab kyang snying rjer ldan pas nyal bar bya'o/_/tho rangs langs nas yang gong ma kho na bzhin du dang po'i las la zhugs pas thams cad bya zhing /_dus mtshams gzhan la yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/_/de skad

[\[88a.5\]]pas phra mo dang thig les sems brtan par gyur nas/_phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa las spro bsdu sngon du 'gro ba ma btang zhing bzung bas brtan par gyur pa'i mtshan ma lnga bo 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de yang gang zhe na/_ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid/_/kha dog lnga yi thig
[\[88a.6\]]le gzer/_/gsal ba dang ni mi gsal ba/_/dang po smig rgyu lta bu dang /_/gnyis pa du ba lta bu ste/_/gsum pa me khyer lta bu dang /_/bzhi pa mar me nyer 'bar ba/_/lnga pa sprin med nam mkha' ste/_/lha dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa'o/_/de rnams ni

[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rnams ni/_/de ru mdor na spro bar bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yi/_/sngags kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod/_/ces 'byung bas so/_/de ltar brtan par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma rnam pa lnga mngon du gyur pa de la ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor ba zhes gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor
[\[88b.2\]]pa de mtshan ma mthong yang rung ma mthong yang rung ste/_dad pa dang ldan zhing snod du rung bas zhus pa'am/_gzugs brnyan glegs bam la sogs pa bsgom par 'dod pas zhus pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can sdig pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma ngan pa mthong bas zhus
[\[88b.3\]]pa'am/_snod du rung zhing ngang tshul bzang bo dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma zhus kyang btsud de/_de rnams kyi don du gong nas gsungs pa'i bsnyen pa'i cho ga la gnas nas 'dzab tu ma bzlas pa'am/_'dzab 'bum la sogs pa bzlas pa byas nas/_ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba

[\[88b.5\]]dang /_/gzugs brnyan pu sti la sogs dang /_/sdig pa'i dbang gis mtshan ngan mthong /_/snod ldan rnams kyis ma zhus kyang /_/ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam/_/zhes 'byung bas so/_/des dkyil 'khor bri ba yang bdag nyid slob dpon dang slob ma gnyis kyis bri

[\[89a.1\]]ba ni 'di lta ste/_sgo dag par bya ba la sogs pa nas rjes su chags par bya ba'i bar gyis dang po'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su zhugs pa sngon du byas nas rig pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pad+ma'i nang du stong pa nyid dam sa

[\[89b.5\]]tha mal pa'i dngos grub gang yang rung ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /_dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar/_/sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na/_/rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dkyus ma brjod
[\[89b.6\]]de/_de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa de gong du gsungs pa'i cho ga rgyun ring du brtsams nas/_rnal 'byor pa gsum par gyur pa ni zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rmi lam ltar rang 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_gzhan la yang ston par nus pa thob pas de skad ces bya'o/_/bla ma'i

[\[90a.1\]]lhan cig dbyer med pa rtogs pas/_bzlas brjod kyi spro bsdu kho na'i sgo nas rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni kha cig nyin mtshan du sbyor ba la brten pa yin no/_/de skad du gsungs pa/_ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis/_/spro dang bsdu ba byed pa ni/_/nyin

[\[90a.4\]]rgyas dkyil khor sbyor ba yis/_/bsam gtan rdo rje bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/_/'khor lo can kun zhugs par bya/_/mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis/_/blo dang ldan pas rab tu bya/_/slob dpon snying gar bsgoms na ni/_/dbang bskur ba ni brtsam

[\[90a.7\]]byas te/_/zhes so/_/de ni slob ma gzhug pa dang /_sgrub pa'i don du dgongs pa'o/_/de las gzhan pa'i slob ma der 'jug par mi nus pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyi'i bya ba la mngon par zhen cing blo dman pa rnams la ni/_/rnal 'byor pa des ye shes 'ga' zhig la dbang thob pa'i
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]tshul du yang /_ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes slob dpon chen po'i zhal snga nas gsung bar mdzad do/_/de bas slob dpon Dom+bi pa'i zhal snga nas kyang /_ye shes dbang du gyur pas ni/_/slob ma snod rung dad ldan dang /_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba dbang

[\[90b.4\]]'gro bas snod la phab pa'i lhas bris pa'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas/_lam gyi sbyor ba'i mtshan ma gang mthong ba'i bye brag gis gnas te bsgrubs na ji ltar gsungs pa'i yon tan zla ba phyed la sogs pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de sgrub pa'i dkyil
[\[90b.5\]]'khor ni ri mor bya'o/_/de yang gang ltar bya zhe na/_las dang po ltar bdag nyid kyis bya ba ma yin te ye shes 'ga' tsam pa'i ltar snod la phab pa'i lhas bya'o/_/de bas na rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /_rdo rje thig ni gdab pa dang /_/tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba dag/_/sngags kyi sems

[\[90b.7\]]bya/_/sku yi kha dog go 'phang mchog/_/rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'byung /_/rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che/_/bdag gi rig pas dbab par bya/_/'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba rab tu brtag pa yin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang /_/mA ma kI yang dbab par bya/_/

[\[91a.1\]]'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o/_/de ltar byas na byin gyis rlob/_/sems la dbang ba nyid shes te/_/gsang ba dag ni mchog stsol lo/_/zhes so/_/de nas tha mal pa'i dngos grub grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa des
[\[91a.2\]]grub pa'i mngag gzhug bskul nas des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du khrid nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos thos par byas nas/_/rnal 'byor pa bzhi par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /_sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[91a.3\]]zab mo'i chos kyang thos par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur/_/zhes pa ste/_'dir sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni/_sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba la dgongs pa'o/_/de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnyid
[\[91a.4\]]cung zad 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de'i dus su mtshan ma ni 'di dag ste/_rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /_bsam gtan bzlas la 'bad pa yis/_/sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong /_/de la 'dir ni rmi lam dam tshig chen po'i tshig go/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/rnam pa'i
[\[91a.5\]]dbye ba gnyis su snang /_/chos kyi ye shes mchog thob pas/_/sangs rgyas mthu dang 'dra bar mthong /_/sangs rgyas rdzogs longs sprul pa'i sku/_/dpag med pa ni myur du mthong /_/sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa/_/mchod par byas par de mthong ngo /_/

[\[91b.1\]]yid 'ong dang /_/khye'u bu mo dag mthong na/_/des ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu sangs rgyas mang po rnams/_/zhing na gnas pa nges par mthong /_/thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang /_/chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol/_/chos kyi 'khor lo sgyu ma'i sku/_/
[\[91b.2\]]sems can kun gyis yongs bskor ba/_/bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i/_/dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur/_/sna tshogs kun dga' skyed mos tshal/_/lha yi bu mo la sogs rgyan/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas/_/bsam gtan dam tshig can
[\[91b.3\]]gyis mthong /_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/de ni dbang bskur mngon par mthong /_/rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis/_/mchod pa byas par de mthong ngo /_/rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i/_/rmi lam dri ma med mthong na/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/skyes

[\[93b.1\]]pa ltar rtogs pa de las yang dag pa'i ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /_rdo rje nyi ma nub nas kyang /_/bsgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya/_/skya rings shar ba'i dus su ni/_/skyes bu de ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nyid

[\[94a.1\]]po de'i man ngag snyan khung nas brgyud pa rnams blo la gnas bzhin par byas nas/_skye bo rnams gzung bar bya ba'i don du rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi bkod pa'i rim pa cung zad bstan par byas so/_/la la ni bdag la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin

[\[96a.1\]]yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i rang bzhin la rtag pa ni bsam gtan no/_/bsam gtan de yang dbye bas rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/_rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang dag ste/_lnga po der ni bsam gtan bsdu/_/brtag dang

[\[97a.1\]]bur shin tu mdzes pa'o/_/rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la yan lag gis 'khyud pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa snying por gyur pa rtag tu bsgom par bya ba ni phra ba'i rnal 'byor dang mtshungs pa ni yan lag gsum pa'o//_//da ni yan lag bzhi pa

[\[97b.1\]]ba'i dbugs zad pas na chos mchog chen po'i mtshan nyid snang ba thob pa'i gnas skabs so/_/snang ba'i rnam pa yang phyogs dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du khyab pa ston pa'i bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis snyoms pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nas 'byung ba'i dbugs zad

[\[98a.1\]]pa sde gong du sangs rgyas la sogs pa rjes su dran pa de lta bu'i shes pa dran pa'o/_/rang dang gzhan pa so sor snang ba dang mnyam pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dang 'dra bar shes pa skyes pa'o/_/de nyid 'di ltar bshad par bya ste/_gong du mtshan ma

[\[98b.1\]]'gyur ba'i shes pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de 'di ltar bshad par bya ste/_gong 'di yan lag lnga pa nas sems brtan par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang bzhin so sor snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dang 'dra ba yang dang yang du skyed par byed nus

[\[136a.2\]]bar 'dod chags rdo rje'o/_/brla nas rkang pa la gtugs la/_/don yod bltas te yi ge des/_/lha mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/_/de la de rnams brtag par bya/_hUM skyes pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/_/de ni dmar po 'od phreng ba/_/gsang yin rang gi gsang ba yang /_/rdo rjer gyur par
[\[136a.3\]]rnam par bsam/_/yi ge AHdang oM las byung /_/de dag ze 'bru nor bu dang /_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni du ma ru/_/bdag kyang bsgom par bya ba'o/_/'dod chags chags pa'i spyan gyis blta/_/de nas de dang bde 'dod pas/_/rgyal ba'i rjes chags bya ba yi/_/lugs yin
[\[136a.4\]]zhes ni byas pa'i sems/_/mnyam pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis/_/'od zer zhags pas bkug nas ni/_/sngags pas dga' ba brtsam par bya/_/rang 'dra'i nang du lhung gyur bas/_/'dod chags nyes ba spangs nas ni/_/skal bzang ma dang rjes chags bya/_/sangs rgyas mchod
[\[136a.5\]]phyir nga rgyal bya/_/sngags 'di nye bar brjod par bya'o/_/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_ting 'dzin rang don bsgom pa'o/_/'di ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o/_/de'i phyir dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/_/gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya/_/ye shes sems dpa'i
[\[136a.6\]]snying zla yi/_/yi ge maM gyi 'od zer gyis/_/sangs rgyas tshogs la gsol btab nas/_/rang gi sa bon nang gzhug bya/_/rang rig pad+ma'i khongs su ni/_/rdo rje nas ni gdon par bya/_/byang chub sems ni zhu gyur nas/_/rang gi 'od ni 'bar ba las/_/de dag gyur pa sa bon te/_/
[\[136a.7\]]rang gi 'od zer 'bar ba las/_/de gyur rang gi sa bon dgod/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/rten dang brten pa rnam par gsal/_/gcig nyung nyi shu'i lha rnams so/_/de ru brtan par byas nas ni/_/rjes gnang thob bya rigs bdag las/_/cho ga bzhin du 'khor lo
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]gdon/_/sgrub pa po yis sngags brjod pas/_/bden min sgro 'dogs las byung ba/_/zhe sdang rgyun ni dag pa yis/_/ma 'dris in+d+ra nI la'i 'od/_/phyag mtshan rdo rje sems dang mtshungs/_/rnam dag ye shes las grub pa/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las/_/cung zad 'gro
[\[136b.2\]]ba'i nyams tshul ldan/_/sangs rgyas stong ni spro byed pa/_/dmar dang gnag dang dkar po'i gzugs/_/g.yon dang dbus dang g.yas rnams so/_/badzra d+h+r-ika gis yang dag bskul/_/mi bskyod gtso bo gdon par bya/_/phyogs kyi sems can zhe sdang rigs/_/zhe sdang rdo rje'i rang
[\[136b.3\]]bzhin byas/_/yid kyis de ltar rig byas nas/_/bsdus nas bdag la bstim par bya/_/gzugs phung kun gzhi rnam par shes/_/gti mug lus ni rnam dag pa/_/me long ye shes yang dag pa/_/'khor lo ral gri nor bu pad/_/rdo rje 'dzin chen rnam pa yi/_/zhal dang kha dog
[\[136b.4\]]rjes su byed/_/slar yang yid kyis gdon par bya/_/dzi na dzika gis rtag pa'o/_/'gro ba'i gti mug bcom nas ni/_/ma lus de yi ngo bor byas/_/de bsdus nas ni blo ldan gyis/_/mdun du ri bong dkyil 'khor dgod/_/nga rgyal nyon mongs can yod tshor/_/phung po rnam par dag gyur
[\[136b.5\]]pa/_/mnyam nyid ye shes yang dag ldan/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i zhal/_/rat+na d+h+r-ig gis rin chen dbang /_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i dang mtshungs 'od/_/bdag nyid chen pos gdon par bya/_/rin chen ral gri 'khor lo pad/_/de yis ma lus 'jig rten 'di/_/gzigs nas bdag
[\[136b.6\]]dang mnyam par mdzod/_/yang dag bsdus nas lho phyogs char/_/de ni nyi mar dgod par bya/_/'du shes phung po dag 'dod chags/_/rnam rtog shes pa dag gyur pa/_/so sor yang dag rtog par bya/_/pad+ma ral gri nor 'khor lo/_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni/_/'jam pa'i cha
[\[136b.7\]]byad dang 'dra'o/_/snang ba mtha' yas shin tu dmar/_/A ro l-ika gis gdon bar bya/_/brjod bya rjod byed las 'das pa'i/_/chos nyid rab tu ston byed pas/_/'dod chags sems can dag byas nas/_/bzlog pa las ni yang dag byung /_/'dod chags chen po la gnas pa/_/brtul

[\[137a.1\]]zhugs can gyis yang dag bzung /_/rgyab tu pad+ma nyi dkyil du/_/der byon gnas par yang dag blta/_/phrag dog la zhugs rnam par shes/_/'du byed phung po dag pa yis/_/gcig tu ljang gu mtha' yas 'od/_/ral gri 'khor lo nor bu pad/_/pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika gis

[\[137a.3\]]nas byang gi phyogs su ni/_/mtsho skyes nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/slar yang bzhugs par bsgom par bya/_/rtse gcig yid kyis gsal bar bsgom/_/kun kyang dam pa'i shes rab 'khyud/_/legs brgyan rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis/_/rdo rje skyil mo krung bsgom bya/_/
[\[137a.4\]]ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'o/_/sa dang snying po thabs dang ni/_/stong ba nyid sgo'i rang bzhin can/_/rtag pa'i gzugs kyis spyan ma ni/_/mo ha ra tI zhes pas gdon/_/sems can don la brtson pa dang /_/snying rje stong pa nyid kyi sgo/_/rang gi nyes spong bsam gtan
[\[137a.5\]]dang /_/yang dag pa yi las dang ni/_/myur bar bde ba'i byang chub dang /_/ma lus thabs ni gsum dag dang /_/'gro ba ring du song ba las/_/ji lta'i stobs kyis gzhag byas nas/_/nyes dang 'jigs pas kun nyen la/_/phan phyir de ni yang dag gnas/_/bsdus nas yid
[\[137a.6\]]kyis blta byas te/_/me ru zhi bsgrub byed ma'o/_/byams dang smon lam yang dag ldan/_/chu khams mtshan ma med pa yis/_/rnam dag lha mo mA ma kI/_/mi bskyod rang 'od dang mtshungs pa/_/dwe Sha ra tI zhes bskul nas/_/kun nas 'od zer mi mnyam dang /_/tshogs ni sogs
[\[137a.7\]]par rtsom pa dang /_/sems can don la rjes 'brel dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang /_/'dir ni smon lam gsum dag dang /_/mi g.yo ba la nges bzhugs nas/_/byams sogs dam pa la bzhugs nas/_/'gro ba kun gyi don byas te/_/'gro ba de de 'od 'bar byas/_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]bsdus nas bden bral du bkod pa/_/yang dag 'jigs pa 'joms byed ma'o/_/stobs kyi pha rol phyin dang me/_/dga' ba dang ni smon pa med/_/dag pa'i gos dkar mo gdon bya/_/'od dpag med pa'i btsun mor mtshungs/_/rA ga ra tI zhes bskul nas/_/sgeg pa'i
[\[137b.2\]]nyams dang dam pa'i dga'/_/dga' ba la sogs yon tan dang /_/rang las nyon mongs bdud sogs las/_/rnam par bzlog la dgod pa ste/_/de yis 'gro la phan par byas/_/'dir ni stobs ni rnam gsum dang /_/legs pa'i blo gros la gzhag pa/_/ji ltar byas
[\[137b.3\]]nas yang dag 'ongs/_/'od mdzes 'khrigs pa'i phreng ba can/_/rlung du rgyas pa 'phel mdzad ma/_/rnal 'byor ba yis bzhugs par bsgom/_/btang snyoms ye shes pha rol phyin/_/rlung dang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/rnam dag sgrol ma gdon par bya/_/btso ma'i gser gyi
[\[137b.4\]]'od dang ldan/_/badzra ra tI zhes sngags kyis/_/rin chen dbang gi zhal mdzes ma/_/'gro ba'i bya kun rang gi ni/_/btang snyoms yon tan sogs kyis mdzad/_/mi rtog pa dang rnam rtog dag_/mnyam par rab tu rtogs pa dang /_/sems can don thabs phun sum tshogs/_/lkog
[\[137b.5\]]tu gyur pa'i rjes 'jug la/_/'gro ba thams cad nges par sbyar/_/ye shes pha rol phyin yum dang /_/chos kyi sprin gyi rang bzhin gyi/_/sa la yang dag bzhugs par bya/_/de nas sna tshogs yon tan rten/_/bsgoms nas sbyor bas bsdu byas te/_/dbang ldan du ni lha mo de/_/dbang
[\[137b.6\]]gi las ni sgrub byed bzhugs/_/thams cad rin chen cod pan mtshan/_/lang tsho sar pas 'gying bag can/_/rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor ldan/_/zla mdzes gdan dang de yi 'od/_/bdag 'dra'i thabs la yang dag 'khyud/_/mdzes ma dga' bar bsgom par bya/_/phyogs kyi
[\[137b.7\]]'gro ba'i don byas nas/_/ji lta ji ltar da ltar byung /_/'khor lo ut+pal dmar po pad/_/ut+pal ser po dang 'dra ba/_/phyag mtshan 'di rnams gtso bor 'gyur/_/lhag ma rang gi bdag por mtshungs/_/ser sna'i gnyen por gyur pa yis/_/spyan ma gnyis pa nyid yin te/_/sbyin

[\[138a.1\]]pa'i pha rol phyin dag pa/_/'di ltar gzugs kyi rdo rje gdon/_/chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs grags/_/ji ltar nus pas sbyin pa la/_/ser sna'i dri ma las grol phyir/_/'gro ba ma lus dgod par bya/_/rab ni sngon song dga' ba'i sar/_/'gro ba'i dam

[\[138a.4\]]mchog_/rin chen dbang phyug shes rab mtshungs/_/sems can kun la phan ldan pa/_/dri yi rdo rje yang dag gdon/_/chos la dmigs pa phun tshogs dang /_/sems can sdug bsngal lhag gnas dang /_/gzhan gyis gnod pa la bzod la/_/'gro ba ma lus bkod byas
